description:
Seth had done some video work elsewhere and was thinking about giving it a go again. As many of you know, the guys tend to submit themselves everywhere, so I figure by the time this video airs he will be all over the place. Sorry!
If he's new to ya then alright! Seth is at all guy, about 6'2", and is actually pretty nicely endowed, its just his dick matches his big size.
He grew up in a religious background, and I guess is one of those kids that ended up partying and doing the opposite of everything he was told to do.
His solo was a no brainer, as he'd done enough before that he was real smooth. You can tell though, he still loves to show off and really gets off on the whole process.
He's not sure he's gonna go down the guy-on-guy path, as he said he was sticking to solos, but ya never know, he might run out of studios only wanting solos with him. It be nice to mix him in with some of my guys and see what the chemistry is like.
Enjoy!
title: Seth Boxer - Solo
